Gift Certificate - $500
List.Description:
Gift certificates make great last minute gifts! You choose the dollar amount of your gift, and your recipients select the items they want. Gift certificates are redeemable for anything on the Wine.com site.

Please provide an email address if you would like an electronic gift certificate to be sent to the recipients' email address with the dollar amount, your personal message, and the gift certificate number. Upon receipt, the e-Card gift certificate is ready for your recipient to use. This can be ordered at any time and makes a great last-minute gift!

A beautifully printed gift certificate will also be sent by regular mail. The certificate can either be mailed to the gift recipient, or mailed to yourself if you'd like to deliver it in person. Please allow three to five days for delivery.

Gift certificates are not redeemable for cash. Only one gift certificate may be redeemed per purchase. When placing an order using a gift certificate, please note that complete credit card information will still be required, even if the gift certificate covers the full amount of the order. As long as the value of the gift certificate exceeds the price of the product purchased, no charge will be made to the credit card. Discounts do not apply to gift certificates. Unused balances of gift certificates are automatically credited to your account.

For larger denominations, please contact our customer service department directly at 1-800-592-5870.
